title: What You’ll Receive
content:
You will receive a high-resolution JPEG file (300 DPI) of this stunning artwork, crafted in the elegant 4:5 portrait ratio known for its balanced aesthetics. This file offers an impressive resolution of 11520 x 14400 pixels, ensuring outstanding clarity and detail for even the largest prints. 

Maximum Printable Size (at 300 DPI): Enjoy a spectacular print up to 38.4 x 48 inches (97.5 x 121.9 cm) while maintaining exceptional quality.
instructions: This is the base text for the 'What You’ll Receive' section for the 4x5 aspect ratio. Edit the text to refine the message for this paragraph.
